level.heading: Application.
level.text: This chapter shall apply to policies and certificates of insurance that are health benefit plans as defined under ยง 31-3271(4) that are issued 90 days after April 8, 2011. This chapter shall not apply to short-term limited duration health benefit plans.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-360
level.text: For history of Law 18-360, see notes under ยง 31-3161.
